feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 1:46PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...A STORM FORCE LOW FOR NEXT WEEK... A strong low over the Gulf of Alaska looks to bring a storm force front to the panhandle for the middle of the week. This system will bring increased winds along the outer coast as well as areas along the Dixon Entrance. Wind gusts could range from 40 to 60 mph. While details on the exact wind speeds are still not

entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida...
